Label: Higher latitude chain (Lat 70.5, Long 291.4), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field at Clyde River, Nunavut, Canada, 0.5 sec, Magnetometer Array for Cusp and Cleft Studies (MACCS) - Erik S. Steinmetz (Augsburg College)

VariableDescription.Name: thg_mag_crvr
